text: Compsosoma perpulchrum is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Vigors in 1825. It is known from Argentina and Brazil.BioLib.cz - Compsosoma perpulchrum. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Compsosomatini Category:Beetles described in 1825
title: Compsosoma perpulchrum
